title: Kicking a dead horse...
content:
I know there was just a thread about Papyrus here, but I figured this might be of some interest.

Chris Costello, the designer of Papyrus just started a Blogger forum pertaining to Papyrus:

Papyrus...Love It or Hate It?  
 [http://nomiddleroad.blogspot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080506071445/http:/nomiddleroad.blogspot.com/ "http://nomiddleroad.blogspot.com/")

 [‹ Food Packaging Fonts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080506071445/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28120 "Go to previous forum topic") [can anyone tell me what this dingbat is called? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080506071445/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28101 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DanGayle
